p: Additionally, a considerable increase in the specific surface area (S BET) was also observed ( Table 3). The S BET of the non-pretreated CSACs increased from 421.5787 to 702.4341 m 2/g after the pretreatment. Collectively, the increase in the P v and the S BET confirm the efficacy of the microwave irradiation pretreatment. The pretreatment promotes a synchronization effect to accelerate the particlesâ€™ agitation, and this results in the generation of internal heat. More interestingly, this method of heat generation guarantees a uniform distribution and minimal loss of energy [ 35].
